history.proof: intros. unfold always in *. intros. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
pr: protocol
I: dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop
ii: InductiveInv pr I
A: Type
this: nid
p: proc this V A
P: state -> proc this V A -> Prop
i: state

Goal:
i \In Coh W -> always i p P -> always i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl W) p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this W A) => m \In Coh W /\ ((exists q' : proc this V A, q = WithInv pr I ii (erefl W) q' /\ P m q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P m (Ret v'))))

Premises:
Ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), A -> proc this W A
Notation erefl := @Logic.eq_refl
always : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> (state -> proc this W A -> Prop) -> Prop
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments
nid = nat : Set
Notation V := (mkWorld pr)
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
WithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A
protocol = Protocols.protocol : Type
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, Protocols.Exports.coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
Notation W := (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))
InductiveInv = ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Type Arguments InductiveInv _ _%function_scope
alw_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> always i p P -> always (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this W A) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & (exists q' : proc this V A, q = Inject w q' /\ P i' q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P i' (Ret v'))])
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I A : Type this : nid p : proc this V A P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop i : state |- Type] ?T' : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I A : Type this : nid p : proc this V A P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop i : state |- Type] ?f : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I A : Type this : nid p : proc this V A P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop i : state |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid ->...-> Prop i : state |- seq ?T]
stepWithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 : state) (t : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A) (pf : W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)), pstep s1 (WithInv pr I ii pf t) sc s2 q <-> (exists v : A, [/\ sc = WithInvRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1, s1 \In Coh W & W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A), [/\ sc = WithInvStep sc', q = WithInv pr I ii pf t', W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii), s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1 t sc' s...
alw_step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> pstep s1 p sc s2 q -> always s2 q P
aft_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> after i p P -> after (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & P v i'])
alw_bnd : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (p1 : proc this W A) (p12 : proc this W B) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc this W B)) (s1 : state) (P : state -> B -> Prop), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc this W A) => forall (p : proc this W B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> always s2 p (fun (s : state) (q : proc this W B) => forall v0 : B, q = Ret v0 -> P s v0)) -> always s1 p12 (fun (s : state) (p : proc this W B) => forall v : B, p = Ret v -> P s v)
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
alw_coh : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In Coh W
alw_ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always s1 (Ret v) P
alw_envs : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc this W A) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P
alw_act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> exists S : a_safe a s2, P s2 (Act a) /\ (forall (s3 : state) (v : A) (s4 : state), a_step S s3 v -> network_rely W this s3 s4 -> P s4 (Ret v))) -> always s1 (Act a) P
alw_refl : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> P s p
alw_unfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always s1 Unfinished P
alwsafe_bnd : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (p1 : proc this W A) (p12 : proc this W B) (s1 : state) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc this W B)), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc this W A) => forall (p : proc this W B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> alwsafe s2 p) -> alwsafe s1 p12
alw_imp : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P1 P2 : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc this W A), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always s p P1 -> always s p P2
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A ->...-> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
alw_coh' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In Coh W
alw_ret' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always_sc s1 (Ret v) scs P
alw_safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> forall sc : schedule, safe p sc s
rely_ext : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> forall (this : nid) (i : state) (j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s : state), i \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (i \+ j) s -> exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, s = i' \+ j' /\ i' \In Coh V
stepSeq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W B) (k : B -> proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Seq t k) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : B, [/\ sc = SeqRet, t = Ret v, q = k v, s2 = s1 & s1 \In Coh W]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (p' : proc this W B), [/\ sc = SeqStep sc', q = Seq p' k & pstep s1 t sc' s2 p'])
alw_unfin' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always_sc s1 Unfinished scs P
stepInject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (em : injects V W K) (s1 : state) (t : proc this V A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Inject em t) sc s2 q < -> (exists (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (v : A), [/\ sc = InjectRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1 & extends em s1 s1']) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this V A) (s1' s2' s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), [/\ sc = InjectStep sc', q = Inject em t', s1 = s1' \+ s, s2 = s2' \+ s, s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1' t sc' s2' t'])
alw_imp' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P1 P2 : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc this W A), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always_sc s p scs P1 -> always_sc s p scs P2
rely_split : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \In Coh V -> s2 \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_rely V this s1 s2 /\ network_rely (inj_ext w) this s1' s2'
Inject : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A
pstep_network_sem : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 t sc s2 q -> network_step W this s1 s2
Seq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
pstep : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
pstep_inv : forall (this : nid) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 s2 : state) (sc : schedule) (t t' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A), s1 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> pstep s1 t sc s2 t' -> s2 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))
always_sc : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> seq schedule -> (state -> proc this W A -> Prop) -> Prop
with_inv_coh : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s : state), s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)
after : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> Prop
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
pcat : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W A -> (A -> Pred (proc this W B)) -> Simpl_Pred (proc this W B)

``` 
intros.
unfold always in *.
intros.
intros.
intros.
intros.
intros.
intros.
intros.
split.
- intros.
  intros.
  split.
  + assumption.
  + left.
    exists q.
    auto.
- intros.
  intros.
  split.
  + assumption.
  + right.
    exists v'.
    auto.
```

original: intros. unfold always in *. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. split. - intros. intros. split. + auto. + left. exists q. auto. - intros. intros. split. + auto. + right. exists v'. auto.
